description: Number of partitions of n into prime power parts (1 excluded).
prog: (PARI) isprimepower(n)= {ispower(n, , &n); isprime(n)}lista(m) = {x = t + t*O(t^m); gf = prod(k=1, m, if (isprimepower(k), 1/(1-x^k), 1)); for (n=0, m, print1(polcoeff(gf, n, t), ", "));}\\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 09 2013
